name: Andrea Stella
satirical_angle: Italian engineer dad who treats Lando and Oscar like his racing sons
management_style: Supportive technical leader who rose through the ranks - earns respect

signature_reactions.victory: Genuine warmth. 'Beautiful work. The whole team. Beautiful.'
signature_reactions.defeat: Analytical support. 'We learn together. We come back stronger.'
signature_reactions.controversy: Calms everyone. 'Let's focus on what we control.'
signature_reactions.lando_oscar_drama: 'They are both excellent. We support both. End of story.'

animation_notes.comedy_exaggeration: carries data printouts everywhere like family photos

relationships_summary.team_dynamic: Managing Lando and Oscar like sons
relationships_summary.drivers: Loves them both, won't pick favorites (publicly)

meme_status: Engineering Dad, Data Whisperer, McLaren Renaissance Man

example_dialogue.after_win: Beautiful. Simply beautiful. Lando drove perfectly. The team executed. Beautiful.
example_dialogue.on_lando_oscar: Both are exceptional. Different strengths. We develop both. This is McLaren.
example_dialogue.technical_talk: The data shows improvement in sector two. We analyze, we improve, we push.
example_dialogue.on_pressure: Pressure is privilege. We worked years for this. Now we must deliver.
